Former President Shri @CitiznMukherjee had clearly said that 'it is that the majority has got the mandate to rule and the minority has got the mandate to oppose but nobody has got the mandate to obstruct'. We all must follow this mantra in letter and spirit: PM @narendramodi

We should distinguish between advertisement and awareness campaigns. Campaigns to effect behavioural changes like educating children to wash hands before eating should not be seen as govt advertisements: PM @narendramodi  https://t.co/YWpKDLS0o9

Like we must not differentiate between good and bad terrorism, we must apply uniform yardstick to all acts of violence wherever they take place, in Jharkhand, Bengal or Kerala. This will give a clear message to the perpetrators that the country is against them: PM @narendramodi  https://t.co/6d122yfpNi

The ecosystem of those who have lost elections tried to use the EVMs to derail the poll process and instil mistrust in the minds of the people. After all this, the VVPATs have decisively put this issue to rest: PM @narendramodi

It was said that Jharkhand has become the epicentre of mob lynching and mob violence. Everyone including me is grieved at the loss of life of the youth and the guilty should be given harsh punishment but is it right to defame the whole state of Jharkhand?: PM @narendramodi

EVMs were first used in 1982. In 1988, Parliament gave them legal sanction through a law. In 1992, Congress govt framed rules for their use. So far, 113 State Assembly & 4 Lok Sabha elections have been held using them. Courts have given positive verdicts on them: PM @narendramodi

The Election Commission invited all political parties on the issue of EVMs but only two parties, CPI & NCP went. Why did the rest of the parties questioning the EVMs today not even go: PM @narendramodi

There is a new trend to raise questions over EVMs after losing elections. BJP was also reduced to 2 members once but instead of blaming the poll procedures, we continued to work with firm belief in our Karyakartas, ideology & the people. That's the difference: PM @narendramodi

Due to narrow-mindedness and perversity of thoughts, if some people do not accept the mandate of the people by saying that 'you may have won the election but the country has lost', there can be nothing more insulting for our democracy than this: PM @narendramodi

All members of the Rajya Sabha are always curious to listen to the eloquence of Shri @arunjaitley in all sessions, however he is recuperating from a health condition. We miss him this time but hope we will have the privilege of hearing him again soon enough: PM @narendramodi

Sardar Sarovar Dam was the brainchild of Sardar Patel. But work on this Dam kept getting delayed. As CM of Gujarat, I had to observe a fast for getting this project going. After NDA govt took office, the pace of work has increased immensely, benefitting many people. #PMInLokSabha

Today is 25th June. Not many people know the significance of this date. Emergency was imposed on this date when the Constitution was trampled over, media was gagged & judiciary bullied? In a sharp departure from the original order, reconstituted bench reduced the quantum of income addition for BPSL to Rs 317 crore, thereby providing relief on income of around Rs 500 crore, and also granted it immunity from prosecution and penalty: Dr @sambitswaraj
However, barely a fortnight later, a reconstituted bench changed the order and gave huge relief to BPSL June 30, 2013: Dr @sambitswaraj  https://t.co/QghkLFVqdl  https://t.co/QdUR73u2uN

On the subject of addition of share capital of Rs 412 crore to the income of applicant company, the bench suggested it to be considered as “unaccounted income of the applicant company itself”: Dr @sambitswaraj  https://t.co/ViD6R5pmaM

Settlement Commission issued a draft on 15.06.2013, which was against BPSL, directing addition to applicant’s income & also ordered that “no immunity is granted from prosecution and penalty imposable under the IT Act to the issues arising from application & covered by this order”

BPSL appealed in the Settlement Commission against the notice of Income Tax dept. on December 12, 2011. The Settlement Commission admitted the application within 10 days of filing and termed it “not invalid”: Dr @sambitswaraj  https://t.co/QdUR73u2uN

At the same time, BPSL was under the lens of Income Tax department. The IT department had issued a show-cause notice to BPSL & sought the company to make income additions for assessment years 2004-05 to 2011-12 on various accounts aggregating to over Rs 800 crore: @sambitswaraj

Bhushan Power and Steel Limited (BPSL) gave unsecured loans to Allegeny Finlease Pvt Ltd that used this money to buy the same land from Robert Vadra’s Sky Light Hospitality: Dr @sambitswaraj  https://t.co/QdUR73u2uN  https://t.co/wlODJzAes8
Robert Vadra sold this land to Allegeny Finlease Pvt Ltd in Jan 2012 at Rs. 5.15 crore- at Rs 7.41 lakh per hectare, 7 times the purchase price: Dr @sambitswaraj   https://t.co/QdUR73u2uN

In January 2010, Robert Vadra’s Sky Light Hospitality had bought the land in two deals for a total of Rs. 72 lakh, at a little over Rs. 1 lakh per hectare from local landowners through land mafia and their fronts Mahesh Nagar, Onkar Mal Yadav and Naveen Mahipal: Dr @sambitswaraj  https://t.co/CbIrIkTJD5
